bill.title: Office of Public Assistance Inspector General; establish.
bill.description: An Act To Establish And Empower The Office Of Public Assistance Inspector General; To Prescribe Qualifications For The Public Assistance Inspector General; To Prescribe The Duties And Responsibilities Of The Office Of Public Assistance Inspector General Relative To The Investigation, Reporting And Prosecuting Of Public Assistance Fraud And Misrepresentation; To Grant Subpoena Power To The Public Assistance Inspector General; To Provide A Complaints Procedure; To Prohibit Disclosure Of Confidential Information; To Amend Sections 25-9-171, 33-15-43, 43-1-23, 43-13-129, 43-13-131, 43-13-219, 43-13-221, 43-13-227, 43-13-229, 43-13-231, 43-17-25, 43-33-16, 43-47-37, 71-5-17 And 71-5-19, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Specifically Authorize The Public Assistance Inspector General To Investigate And Prosecute Cases Of Medicaid, Tanf, Unemployment Compensation And Housing Assistance Fraud; And In Conformity; And For Related Purposes.
